content: With the boss battle over, you can find a cave entrance on the far side of the muddy arena, leading to The Purifying Spring Shrine, with a **Treasure Chest** full of materials off to the right. You'll also gain access to a new Non-Pure Armor Set to craft by having defeated Zhu Bajie, which boasts some great defense and poison resistance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'The Purifying Spring'.
The content is as follows:
With the boss battle over, you can find a cave entrance on the far side of the muddy arena, leading to The Purifying Spring Shrine, with a **Treasure Chest** full of materials off to the right. You'll also gain access to a new Non-Pure Armor Set to craft by having defeated Zhu Bajie, which boasts some great defense and poison resistance.
